Module ntnu.idatt2001.views
Package ntnu.idatt2001.models

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.models.TaskList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class for one tasklist A tasklist contains all tasks in a given situation (ex. application)

    • removeTask

      public boolean removeTask​(Task task)
      method to remove a task from the given tasklist
      Parameters:
      task - - the task that shall be removed
      Returns:
      true if the task was successfully removed from the tasklist, false if otherwise
